projects.title: Team5 Restaurant
projects.bodyText:
- A restaurant application that enables diners to book a table for a convenient dine-in experience without the wait
 -  Diners will receive confirmation of their reservation via email with the option of madifying or canceling their reservation.
 - Team5 application also offers users to order their favorite meal.

projects.title: Watch Gallery
projects.bodyText:
- Online watch store for enthusiast of fine craftsmenship that allows users to have CRUD ability to view, add, edit, and delete products.
 - Users have to create an account and sign in before being able to access all the features of the web.
 - Developed from inception and wire-framing to deployment with Heroku.

projects.title: Flash Card
projects.bodyText:
- Player has to match 6 pairs of cards to win the game. Based around programming language logos.
 - Developed plan and wireframe to complete the project on a tight deadline.
 - A flash card game solidifying usage of JavaScript, CSS, HTML.
 - Deployed on heroku
